nodes.text: The Uquine system was a star system located within the Colonies that contained the planet Uquine.

The system joined the Galactic Republic early in its history, sometime between 25,000 BBY and 22,000 BBY. In 10,966 BBY, the Pius Dea Faithful were decimated by the combined forces of the Renunciates, Alsakan, the Jedi Order, and the Republic Navy, ending the Seventh Alsakan Conflict and the Pius Dea Era.
